ch0008_10_erika/0101_0701_01_10:
Good day to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
It’s so nice to see you.
ch0008_10_erika/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s enjoy some battles with all kinds of sync
pairs today.
ch0008_10_erika/7101_0701_01_10:
Do you have a particular strategy when
you battle?
ch0008_10_erika/7101_0701_02_10:
I tend to stand my ground like a deeply rooted
plant, watching the field for the perfect
opportunity to attack.
ch0008_10_erika/7101_0701_03_10:
We should battle more so I can observe what kind
of strategies you use!
ch0008_10_erika/7102_0701_01_10: My Leafeon is very clever in battle.
ch0008_10_erika/7102_0701_02_10:
First, she watches her opponent carefully to see
what they’ll do. Just when they let their guard
down, she unleashes a powerful attack!
ch0008_10_erika/7102_0701_03_10:
*chuckle* If you ever battle us, you’d better make
sure you’re paying attention!
ch0008_10_erika/7103_0701_01_10:
When I first came to Pasio, I saw the loveliest
flower I’d ever seen, but when I approached it...
ch0008_10_erika/7103_0701_02_10: I was shocked to discover it was a Roserade!
ch0008_10_erika/7103_0701_03_10:
That Roserade saw that I was watching and
performed a lovely little dance for me.
ch0008_10_erika/7104_0701_01_10:
Look at my new sygna suit. Wearing it makes
me feel like a brand-new person!
ch0008_10_erika/7104_0701_02_10:
I especially love this band that goes around
my waist...
ch0008_10_erika/7104_0701_03_10:
When I tighten it up, I feel like I get into the
right mindset to start my day.
ch0008_10_erika/7105_0701_02_10:
I bought some Sweet Hearts. Would you like to
try them with me?
ch0008_10_erika/7105_0701_03_10: I got them because they match my outfit so well!
ch0008_10_erika/1701_0701_01_10: This is a special gift for you.
ch0008_10_erika/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you can use it!
ch0008_10_erika/1701_0702_01_10:
I just love when my presents are helpful for
my friends!
ch0008_10_erika/2501_0701_01_10:
The air surrounding Leafeon is always so crisp
and clear.
ch0008_10_erika/2501_0701_02_10:
When we’re together, it feels like I’m napping
outside, even on a rainy day.
ch0008_10_erika/2501_0702_01_10: You should try sleeping next to her one day.
ch0008_10_erika/2501_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’d love it, too.
ch0008_10_erika/2511_0701_01_10:
There are many Grass-type Pokémon out there,
but I was so lucky to meet Leafeon.
ch0008_10_erika/2511_0701_02_10: We just get along so well together!
ch0008_10_erika/2511_0702_01_10:
Of course, I think you and I also get along
very well, too.
ch0008_10_erika/2511_0702_02_10: I’m so glad to be friends with you.
ch0008_10_erika/3001_0701_01_10:
When I wake up and the first thing I see is a
flower arrangement, I feel like I can go through
the day with serenity.
ch0008_10_erika/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon. Battling is fun, but it’s also lovely
to take a walk and enjoy all the beautiful flowers.
ch0008_10_erika/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. I’ve found a flower that only
blooms at night. Would you like to come with me
to see it?
